network

Interface NetObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NetPlayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Collider, Damagable, MapFloor, MapWall, Player

    public interface NetObject
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPendingDestroy()
      Is the object queued for destruction
      void receiveNetUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.Serializable> data)
      Used by the clients to update the information of the object
      void render()
      render the object.
      void sendNetUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.Serializable> data)

    • Method Detail

      • sendNetUpdate

        void sendNetUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.Serializable> data)
        Used by the server to gather the information to send to the client during client update
        Parameters:
        data - add information to this object
        Note: the object is already created at the start of the method execution

      • receiveNetUpdate

        void receiveNetUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.Serializable> data)
        Used by the clients to update the information of the object
        Parameters:
        data - update data

      • render

        void render()
        render the object. Should be called once per frame

      • update

        void update(double deltaTime)
        Update the object. Should be called once per frame only server-side
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the time since the last update

      • isPendingDestroy

        boolean isPendingDestroy()
        Is the object queued for destruction
        Returns:
        is the object queued for destruction
